title: Around 1960 a car ran over my brother and he was rushed to, accord to my parents, Sidburys Childerns Hospital in Wilmington. Is this the same hospital as was Babies Hospital?
text:
Babies and Sidbury do appear to be the same hospital. Babies Hospital was started by a Dr. Sidbury.



Here's a link to more information: http://www.starnewsonline.com/news/20160225/tbt---the-babies-hospital
